forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. SSE winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 63F. SSE winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and becoming windy. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and becoming windy. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 61F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
